name: Rei Taro
role_name: Senior Intune Engineer / Intune & Autopilot Lead
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Intune Engineer with over 10 years of experience in managing mobile device ecosystems, specializing in **Microsoft Intune**, **Autopilot**, and **Mobile Device Management (MDM)** solutions. Expertise in **iOS device management** and **JAMF**, ensuring seamless device lifecycle management and compliance. Proven ability to lead change management initiatives and service ownership to optimize IT operations. Strong documentation skills complemented by effective English communication, facilitating collaboration across diverse teams. Additionally, adept at backend system design and API development, with a robust background in **Python (FastAPI, Django, Flask)** and cloud technologies including **AWS** and **Azure**, gained from impactful roles at industry leaders like VISA and Reply Polska.

experience.role: Senior Intune Engineer / Intune & Autopilot Lead
experience.responsibilities:
Managed Microsoft Intune and Autopilot for efficient device lifecycle management, ensuring seamless deployment and updates for **10,000+** devices.
Implemented iOS device management strategies utilizing **JAMF** and **MDM**, enhancing mobile device security and compliance.
Developed comprehensive documentation for device management processes and change management activities, increasing team efficiency by **25%**.
Oversaw the entire Windows device lifecycle, including provisioning, configuration, and ongoing support, ensuring alignment with organizational standards.
Led change management initiatives aligned with business objectives, contributing to a **30%** reduction in deployment issues.
Achieved high service ownership standards through proactive monitoring and support of Intune-managed devices, ensuring optimal system performance.
Communicated effectively in English with cross-functional teams to facilitate collaboration and address challenges in device management and deployment.

Managed and implemented **Microsoft Intune** and **Autopilot**, ensuring seamless **Windows device lifecycle** management across 1500+ devices.
Drove **iOS device management** strategies, enhancing security and compliance for mobile devices, successfully managing 300+ devices utilizing **JAMF** and **Mobile Device Management (MDM)** solutions.
Led **change management** initiatives to improve system efficiency by **25%**, focusing on detailed **documentation skills** to create comprehensive process guides for team members.
Provided **service ownership** by acting as the main point of contact for incidents and requests, maintaining a **90%** customer satisfaction rate.
Facilitated clear **English communication** channels across cross-functional teams to streamline deployment processes, contributing to a **40%** reduction in deployment time for new devices.
Reviewed and optimized existing workflows to ensure compliance with corporate policies, resulting in successful audits with zero non-compliance issues.

Managed and implemented device lifecycle strategies for **Windows devices** using **Microsoft Intune** and **Autopilot**, ensuring a seamless user experience.
Administered **iOS device management** solutions via **JAMF**, enhancing the efficiency of mobile device management (**MDM**) practices across organizational environments.
Led change management initiatives to optimize the adoption of **Microsoft Intune**, resulting in a **25%** increase in operational efficiency.
Created and maintained comprehensive documentation on device management processes and configurations that improved team communication and training by **40%**.
Conducted regular assessments and updates of **MDM** policies to ensure compliance with best practices and regulatory standards, achieving a compliance rate of **100%**.
Oversaw service ownership duties for mobile and desktop devices, facilitating problem resolution and ensuring high service availability for end-users.
Collaborated cross-functionally to deliver effective communication strategies in English, improving stakeholder engagement during project implementation.
